Title: Eden
Actors: Félix de Givry, Pauline Etienne, Vincent Macaigne, Hugo Conzelmann
Plot: Paul, a teenager in the underground scene of early-nineties Paris, forms a DJ collective with his friends and together they plunge into the nightlife of sex, drugs, and endless music.
Production: Région Ile-de-France, Cofinova 10, Canal+, Centre National de la Cinématographie (CNC), Blue Film Production, France 2 Cinéma, SACEM, CG Cinéma, Orange Cinéma Séries, Yundal Films, France Télévision
